title: Help me
body: why is my champ select so laggy, it always freezes up, makes me miss ban mark, and then puts me on queue dodge timer, its so annoying. Any tips

replies.body:
If your computer is running lower-end hardware, it can experience pretty poor performance with the Beta Client. If you're currently using the Beta Client, I'd recommend using the *Legacy Client* instead, as you'll see better performance with it at the moment. You can access the Legacy at any time at the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
